docs.text:
Overview


Finvu has implemented a FIP simulator based on the 
ReBIT API specs
 in order to test the APIs as part of the AA ecosystem. We have also provided an API for inputting source FI data considering different 
FIType
 and these would evolve as we move forward. Kindly refer to the details of the FIP Data API to know more. 


Since this is a closed user group the FIP simulator has support for 
http
 only and future support for 
https
 will be considered.


We are trying to keep upto the pace by implementing latest Rebit API specs for the FIP simulator, however if there any issues, do drop us a note at 
info@cookiejar.co.in


Version


Currently the FIP simulator adheres to the ReBit specs version 1.0.5


FIP Data API


Prior to using the FIP Simulator API, dummy FI data can be entered into FIP source data system using the 
FIP Data API


AA Data API


Prior to using the AA Sandbox API, dummy FI data can be entered into AA source data system using the 
AA Data API


API Key Request


In order to use the FIP and AA API an api key is required to be passed. 


Please send an email to 
info@cookiejar.co.in
 for the api key. 


Refer to the 
FIP API (Simulator)
 page for more information.


Refer to the 
AA API Sandbox
 page for more information.


Root API Endpoint


The root API end point is 
http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: Finvu has implemented a FIP simulator based on the  ReBIT API specs  in order to test the APIs as part of the AA ecosystem. We have also provided an API for inputting source FI data considering different  FIType  and these would evolve as we move forward. Kindly refer to the details of the FIP Data API to know more.   Since this is a closed user group the FIP simulator has support for  http  only and future support for  https  will be considered.  We are trying to keep upto the pace by implementing latest Rebit API specs for the FIP simulator, however if there any issues, do drop us a note at  info@cookiejar.co.in
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: Currently the FIP simulator adheres to the ReBit specs version 1.0.5
docs.title: Version

docs.text: Prior to using the FIP Simulator API, dummy FI data can be entered into FIP source data system using the  FIP Data API
docs.title: FIP Data API

docs.text: Prior to using the AA Sandbox API, dummy FI data can be entered into AA source data system using the  AA Data API
docs.title: AA Data API

docs.text: In order to use the FIP and AA API an api key is required to be passed.   Please send an email to  info@cookiejar.co.in  for the api key.   Refer to the  FIP API (Simulator)  page for more information.  Refer to the  AA API Sandbox  page for more information.
docs.title: API Key Request

docs.text: The root API end point is  http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/
docs.title: Root API Endpoint
FIP API (Simulator)

docs.text: This is a simulator implementation of the FIP API and can be used for testing the Account Aggregator flows as part of the ecosystem.
docs.title: FIP API (Simulator)

docs.text: Below  http  headers need to be set as part of each request     Key  Value      content-Type  application/xml    aa_api_key  Please email us on info@cookiejar.co.in for obtaining the key
docs.title: Request headers

docs.text: The API URL to be used is  <Root API Endpoint>/<FIP API>  as per ReBIT FIP API Specs.

docs.text:
FIP Data API


This API can be used to add sample data for accounts and associated transactions and can be called from an appropriate testing tool such as 
Postman


Adding User Account




















URL


http://api.finvu.in/Accounts/add






HTTP METHOD


POST








Request Body


<UserAccountInfo>
    <UserAccount accountRefNo="RefHDFC0001" accountNo="HDFC11111111" accountTypeEnum="SAVINGS" FIType="DEPOSIT">
      <Identifiers pan="AFYPA24444" mobile="7030608902" email="info@cookiejar.co.in" aadhar="679486011111"></Identifiers> 
    </UserAccount>
    <UserAccount accountRefNo="RefHDFC0002" accountNo="HDFC22222222" accountTypeEnum="CURRENT" FIType="DEPOSIT">
      <Identifiers pan="AFYPA24444" mobile="7030608902" email="info@cookiejar.co.in" aadhar="679486011111"></Identifiers> 
    </UserAccount>
    <UserAccount accountRefNo="RefSBI0001" accountNo="SBI11111111" accountTypeEnum="SAVINGS" FIType="DEPOSIT">
      <Identifiers pan="AFYPA24444" mobile="7030608902" email="info@cookiejar.co.in" aadhar="679486011111"></Identifiers> 
    </UserAccount>
</UserAccountInfo>




Response Expected: 


User account(s) added.

  Account Reference Number : RefHDFC0001
  Account Number : HDFC11111111
  Consent Id : 2c84eba9-4637-45f5-b42e-00e67c128258
 (It use in Account Discovery.)


  Account Reference Number : RefHDFC0002
  Account Number : HDFC22222222
  Consent Id : 09670e7c-7dbb-4d45-8e15-dfcc829caab6
 (It use in Account Discovery.)


  Account Reference Number : RefSBI0001
  Account Number : SBI11111111
  Consent Id : b583190a-d51e-4ce2-9981-f51d0e010af9
 (It use in Account Discovery.)

 Please save this information for FI request API calls.




Adding User Account Transaction




















URL


http://api.finvu.in/Accounts/Transaction/add






HTTP METHOD


POST








Request Body


<UserAccountTrans>
        <UserAccount> 
            <accountRefNo>RefHDFC0001</accountRefNo> 
            <accountNo>HDFC11111111</accountNo> 
            <FIType>DEPOSIT</FIType>
            <accountTypeEnum>SAVINGS</accountTypeEnum>
            <accountData>
    <![CDATA[<Account xmlns="http://api.rebit.org.in/FISchema/deposit" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://api.rebit.org.in/FISchema/deposit../FISchema/deposit.xsd" linkedAccRef="2197b71479a17f8b003da134fab117e7" maskedAccNumber="000401165847" type="deposit">
    <Profile>
        <Holders type="JOINT">
            <Holder name="Test" address="Pune" email="test@finvu.in" landline="02183-230890" mobile="8600045504" city="Pune" state="MH" country="India" zip="411002"/>
        </Holders>
        <Summary type="SAVINGS" branch="Pune" facility="CC" ifscCode="ICIC0000005" micrCode="411229002" openingDate="2018-04-01" currentODLimit="10000" drawingLimit="20000"/>
    </Profile>
    <Balance currentBalance="1358.51" currency="INR" exchgeRate="" balanceDateTime="2018-04-01T18:30:00.000+0000">
        <Pending amount="0.0"/>
    </Balance>
    <Transactions startDate="2018-04-01" endDate="2019-03-31">
        <Transaction txnId="M3775" transactionTimestamp="2015-03-30T18:30:00.000+0000" narration="By Cash" valueDate="2015-03-30T18:30:00.000+0000" type="CREDIT" amount="1000.0" currentBalance="1001.00" mode="OTHERS" reference="2197b71479a17f8b003da134fab117e7" />
        <Transaction txnId="SB3380774" transactionTimestamp="2015-07-02T18:30:00.000+0000" narration="000401165847:Int.Pd:30-06-2014 to 02-07-2015" valueDate="2015-07-02T18:30:00.000+0000" type="CREDIT" amount="10.0" currentBalance="1011.00" mode="OTHERS" reference="2197b71479a17f8b003da134fab117e7" />
        <Transaction txnId="S24889192" transactionTimestamp="2015-07-02T18:30:00.000+0000" narration="PKT/100000009881/DG~000401166353~000401165847" valueDate="2015-07-02T18:30:00.000+0000" type="CREDIT" amount="100.0" currentBalance="1111.00" mode="OTHERS" reference="2197b71479a17f8b003da134fab117e7" />
        <Transaction txnId="S24889193" transactionTimestamp="2015-07-02T18:30:00.000+0000" narration="PKT/100000009881/DG~000401166353~000401165847" valueDate="2015-07-02T18:30:00.000+0000" type="CREDIT" amount="9796.0" currentBalance="1211.00" mode="OTHERS" reference="2197b71479a17f8b003da134fab117e7" />
        <Transaction txnId="S24889193" transactionTimestamp="2015-07-02T18:30:00.000+0000" narration="PKT/100000010986/DG~000401166353~000401165847" valueDate="2015-07-02T18:30:00.000+0000" type="CREDIT" amount="1.01" currentBalance="1212.01" mode="OTHERS" reference="2197b71479a17f8b003da134fab117e7" />
        <Transaction txnId="S24929945" transactionTimestamp="2015-07-02T18:30:00.000+0000" narration="" valueDate="2015-07-02T18:30:00.000+0000" type="CREDIT" amount="4.5" currentBalance="1356.51" mode="OTHERS" reference="2197b71479a17f8b003da134fab117e7" />
        <Transaction txnId="S26293463" transactionTimestamp="2015-07-02T18:30:00.000+0000" narration="UPI/705120481717/manu12@icici" valueDate="2015-07-02T18:30:00.000+0000" type="CREDIT" amount="1.0" currentBalance="1357.51" mode="OTHERS" reference="2197b71479a17f8b003da134fab117e7" />
        <Transaction txnId="S26293472" transactionTimestamp="2015-07-02T18:30:00.000+0000" narration="UPI/705411482008/timesofmoney@eazypay" valueDate="2015-07-02T18:30:00.000+0000" type="CREDIT" amount="1.0" currentBalance="1358.51" mode="OTHERS" reference="2197b71479a17f8b003da134fab117e7" />
    </Transactions>
</Account>




Response Expected: 


User account transaction added.

AA API Sandbox

docs.text: This is a Sandbox implementation of the AA API and can be used for testing the Account Aggregator flows as part of the ecosystem.
docs.title: AA API Sandbox

docs.text: Below  http  headers need to be set as part of each request     Key  Value      content-Type  application/xml    fip_api_key  Please email us on info@cookiejar.co.in for obtaining the key
docs.title: Request headers

docs.text: The API URL to be used is  <Root API Endpoint>/<FIP API>  as per ReBIT AA API Specs.
docs.title: API Request

/Consent/handle/{consentHandle}
Consents/{id}
/FI/request
/FI/fetch/{sessionId}

docs.text:
Central Trust Store


This is a Central Trust Store for the Account Aggregator Ecosystem and is a prototype based on current ReBIT API defnition for the Central Trust Store.  


Add New Entity (AA, FIP, FIU)


Below is the API for adding details on FIP, AA or FIU. 


Note: In case of AA and FIU currently fitypes needs to be provided when adding details, although it would be ignored when used.


HTTP METHOD: 
POST


URL: 
//aactsuat.finvu.in/saveEntity/<Entity Type>


e.g.: https://aactsuat.finvu.in/saveEntity/FIP


e.g.: https://aactsuat.finvu.in/saveEntity/AA


e.g.: https://aactsuat.finvu.in/saveEntity/FIU


Request Body


{
  "ver": "1.0",
  "timestamp": "2019-06-16T03:01:53.410Z",
  "txnid": "29ae-11e8-a8d7-0289",
  "requester": {
    "name": "Finvu",
    "id": "AA010001"
  },
  "entityinfo": {
    "name": "Cookiejar Technologies Private Limited",
    "id": "AA010001",
    "code": "CTPL",
    "baseurl": "https://aauat.finvu.in/API/V1",
    "fitypes": [
      "DEPOSIT","EQUITY"
    ],
    "certificate": {"keys":
       [
         {"kty":"EC",
          "crv":"P-256",
          "x":"MKBCTNIcKUSDii11ySs3526iDZ8AiTo7Tu6KPAqv7D4",
          "y":"4Etl6SRW2YiLUrN5vfvVHuhp7x8PxltmWWlbbM4IFyM",
          "use":"enc",
          "kid":"1"},

         {"kty":"RSA",
          "n": "0vx7agoebGcQSuuPiLJXZptN9nndrQmbXEps2aiAFbWhM78LhWx     4cbbfAAtVT86zwu1RK7aPFFxuhDR1L6tSoc_BJECPebWKRXjBZCiFV4n3oknjhMs     tn64tZ_2W-5JsGY4Hc5n9yBXArwl93lqt7_RN5w6Cf0h4QyQ5v-65YGjQR0_FDW2     QvzqY368QQMicAtaSqzs8KJZgnYb9c7d0zgdAZHzu6qMQvRL5hajrn1n91CbOpbI     SD08qNLyrdkt-bFTWhAI4vMQFh6WeZu0fM4lFd2NcRwr3XPksINHaQ-G_xBniIqb     w0Ls1jF44-csFCur-kEgU8awapJzKnqDKgw",
          "e":"AQAB",
          "alg":"RS256",
          "kid":"2011-04-29"}
       ]
     },
    "tokeninfo": {
      "url": "https://aauat.finvu.in/API/V1",
      "maxcalls": 1,
      "desc": "string"
    }
  }
}




Response Expected: 


Record save successfully with Entity Id AA




Updating Entity (AA, FIP, FIU)


Below is the API for updating details on FIP, AA or FIU. 


HTTP METHOD: 
PUT


URL: 
//aactsuat.finvu.in/saveEntity


Request Body


{
  "ver": "1.0",
  "timestamp": "2019-06-16T03:01:53.410Z",
  "txnid": "29ae-11e8-a8d7-0289",
  "requester": {
    "name": "Finvu",
    "id": "AA010001"
  },

    "id": "AA010001",
    "code": "CTPL",
    "baseurl": "https://aauat.finvu.in/API/V1",
    "fitypes": [
      "DEPOSIT","EQUITY"
    ],
    "certificate": {"keys":
       [
         {"kty":"EC",
          "crv":"P-256",
          "x":"MKBCTNIcKUSDii11ySs3526iDZ8AiTo7Tu6KPAqv7D4",
          "y":"4Etl6SRW2YiLUrN5vfvVHuhp7x8PxltmWWlbbM4IFyM",
          "use":"enc",
          "kid":"1"},

         {"kty":"RSA",
          "n": "0vx7agoebGcQSuuPiLJXZptN9nndrQmbXEps2aiAFbWhM78LhWx     4cbbfAAtVT86zwu1RK7aPFFxuhDR1L6tSoc_BJECPebWKRXjBZCiFV4n3oknjhMs     tn64tZ_2W-5JsGY4Hc5n9yBXArwl93lqt7_RN5w6Cf0h4QyQ5v-65YGjQR0_FDW2     QvzqY368QQMicAtaSqzs8KJZgnYb9c7d0zgdAZHzu6qMQvRL5hajrn1n91CbOpbI     SD08qNLyrdkt-bFTWhAI4vMQFh6WeZu0fM4lFd2NcRwr3XPksINHaQ-G_xBniIqb     w0Ls1jF44-csFCur-kEgU8awapJzKnqDKgw",
          "e":"AQAB",
          "alg":"RS256",
          "kid":"2011-04-29"}

Extracting Entity (AA, FIP, FIU)


HTTP METHOD: 
GET


URL: 
//aactsuat.finvu.in/entityInfo/<Entity Type>/<Entity ID>


e.g.
https://aactsuat.finvu.in/entityInfo/AA/AA010001


Response Expected: 


{
    "ver": "1.0",
    "timestamp": "2019-06-17T10:20:56.537+0000",
    "txnid": "ff8b7364-d507-4898-a2c1-66f23e5e9753",
    "requester": null,
    "entityinfo": {
        "name": "Cookiejar Technologies Private Limited",
        "id": "AA010001",
        "code": "CTPL",
        "baseurl": "https://aauat.finvu.in/API/V1",
        "fitypes": [
            "DEPOSIT",
            "EQUITY"
        ],
        "certificate": {
            "keys": [
                "{kty=EC, crv=P-256, x=MKBCTNIcKUSDii11ySs3526iDZ8AiTo7Tu6KPAqv7D4, y=4Etl6SRW2YiLUrN5vfvVHuhp7x8PxltmWWlbbM4IFyM, use=enc, kid=1}",
                "{kty=RSA, n=0vx7agoebGcQSuuPiLJXZptN9nndrQmbXEps2aiAFbWhM78LhWx     4cbbfAAtVT86zwu1RK7aPFFxuhDR1L6tSoc_BJECPebWKRXjBZCiFV4n3oknjhMs     tn64tZ_2W-5JsGY4Hc5n9yBXArwl93lqt7_RN5w6Cf0h4QyQ5v-65YGjQR0_FDW2     QvzqY368QQMicAtaSqzs8KJZgnYb9c7d0zgdAZHzu6qMQvRL5hajrn1n91CbOpbI     SD08qNLyrdkt-bFTWhAI4vMQFh6WeZu0fM4lFd2NcRwr3XPksINHaQ-G_xBniIqb     w0Ls1jF44-csFCur-kEgU8awapJzKnqDKgw, e=AQAB, alg=RS256, kid=2011-04-29}"
            ]
        },
        "tokeninfo": {
            "url": "https://aauat.finvu.in/API/V1",
            "maxcalls": 1,
            "desc": "string"
        }
    }
}




Extracting Entity List (AA, FIP, FIU)


HTTP METHOD: 
GET


URL: 
//aactsuat.finvu.in/entityInfo/<Entity Type>


e.g. https://aactsuat.finvu.in/entityInfo/FIP


e.g. https://aactsuat.finvu.in/entityInfo/AA


e.g. https://aactsuat.finvu.in/entityInfo/FIU


Response Expected: 


[
    {
        "name": "Cookiejar Technologies Private Limited",
        "id": "AA010001",
        "code": "FINVUTPL",
        "baseurl": "https://finvu.in/API/V1",
        "fitypes": [
            "DEPOSIT",
            "EQUITY"
        ],
        "certificate": {

docs.title: Central Trust Store

docs.text: This is a Central Trust Store for the Account Aggregator Ecosystem and is a prototype based on current ReBIT API defnition for the Central Trust Store.
